paragraphs.title: Convert CSV-based DataFrame into TaggedItems
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.sql.Row
import com.advancedspark.ml.TaggedItem

val itemsRDD = itemsDF.select($"id", $"title", $"tags").map(row => {
  val id = row.getInt(0)
  val title = row.getString(1)
  val tags = row.getString(2).trim.split("\\|")
  TaggedItem(id, title, tags)
})

paragraphs.title: Cartesian product of all items
paragraphs.text:
val allItemPairsRDD = itemsRDD.cartesian(itemsRDD)
  .filter(itemPair => (itemPair._1.id != itemPair._2.id)) // Filter out equal items and 
  .filter(itemPair => (itemPair._1.id < itemPair._2.id)) // Filter out duplicate pairs (preserve only lower triangle)
  .cache()
  
val allItemPairsCount = allItemPairsRDD.count()

paragraphs.title: Calculate Jaccard Similarity between all Items above a threshold
paragraphs.text:
import com.advancedspark.ml.Similarity

val minJaccardSimilarityThreshold = 0.01

val similarItemPairsAboveThresholdRDD = allItemPairsRDD
  .map(itemPair => (itemPair._1, itemPair._2, Similarity.getJaccardSimilarity(itemPair._1, itemPair._2)))

  .filter(_._3 >= minJaccardSimilarityThreshold) // Filter pairs above the threshold
  
  .cache() // Cache because this is used later and is a very expensive operation 

val similarItemPairCount = similarItemPairsAboveThresholdRDD.count()

z.show(similarItemsAboveThresholdRDD.toDF("item1", "item2", "jaccard_similarity").sort($"jaccard_similarity" desc))

paragraphs.title: Cluster Items Using Similarity Pairs with Power Iteration Clustering
Enrich the cluster assignments with item data
paragraphs.text:
val clusterAssignmentsRDD = clusteringModel.assignments.map { assignment =>
  (assignment.id, assignment.cluster)
}

val enrichedClusterAssignmentsDF = clusterAssignmentsRDD.toDF("itemId", "clusterId")
  .join(itemsDF, $"itemId" === $"id")
  .select($"clusterId", $"itemId", $"title", $"tags")
  .sort($"clusterId" desc)
  
z.show(enrichedClusterAssignmentsDF)
